core.name: Coninas lost haircutting scissors
core.description:
Conina, daughter of legendary barbarian hero Cohen chose a career as a hair dresser despite the unfortunate drawback of inheriting her fathers talents.
This didn't work out as well as she had hoped.
Her scissors are made of excellent tempered steel, though the hinge-bolt has been rusted from years in the sewers.

events.onuse:
from ezdm_libs.item import Item
from ezdm_libs.util import load_json
dagger1=Item(load_json('items','coninas_mainhand_scissor_dagger_+1.json'))
dagger2=Item(load_json('items','coninas_offhand_scissor_dagger_+1.json'))
player.acquire_item(dagger1)
player.equip_item(0)
player.acquire_item(dagger2)
player.equip_item(0)
player.save()
campaign.error('The rusty bolt shatters leaving you with two excellent steel blades which will make good daggers !')
